Process text formatting commands

Parameters

surface –

get_skill_index_from_skill_clicked(relative_x, relative_y)[source]¶

Return the index of the skill clicked in the skill bar

Parameters

  • relative_x –

  • relative_y –

Returns

-1 if nothing, else 0-4.

Return type

int

Notes

The skills in the skill bar are pulled, in order, from the player`s known skills.
